volunteer_experience.info:
Under the initiative of CII Indian Women Network and SIMSREE, Mentoring Meet 2019, We got an opportunity to mentor budding women entrepreneurs for structuring and enhancing their reach to the customer. 1. We helped them strategize their business and develop a suitable structure for their business.2. We helped in making their financial statements more comprehensible and advised on increasing their bottom line.3. We also helped them tap into new markets by suggesting possible marketsâ€¦

          Under the initiative of CII Indian Women Network and SIMSREE, Mentoring Meet 2019, We got an opportunity to mentor budding women entrepreneurs for structuring and enhancing their reach to the customer. 1. We helped them strategize their business and develop a suitable structure for their business.2. We helped in making their financial statements more comprehensible and advised on increasing their bottom line.3. We also helped them tap into new markets by suggesting possible markets and marketing strategies.
            

    
    

    
        Show less

volunteer_experience.title: Business Mentor

volunteer_experience.info:
As the student volunteer, I participated in several awareness events like rallies, walkathon, teaching the underprivileged, mentoring the juniors, etc.During the seven day camping event in 2017, worked with a team of over 100 students guided by 5 mentors, we indulged in activities like:1. Street play and Rallies on Blood donation2. Awareness on cleanliness and cleaning of the village3. Mentoring the school students and conducting activities for themAt the closingâ€¦
            

    
    

    
        Show more

          
    
  
      

        
          As the student volunteer, I participated in several awareness events like rallies, walkathon, teaching the underprivileged, mentoring the juniors, etc.During the seven day camping event in 2017, worked with a team of over 100 students guided by 5 mentors, we indulged in activities like:1. Street play and Rallies on Blood donation2. Awareness on cleanliness and cleaning of the village3. Mentoring the school students and conducting activities for themAt the closing ceremony of the camp, I addressed the community in Tamil (A language not very well know to me at that time.)Volunteered in annual day fest whose chief guest was the then Chief Minister, Edappadi K. Palanisamy Sir. Monitored the smooth functioning of the event. 
            

    
    

    
        Show less
volunteer_experience.subtitle: National Service Scheme
volunteer_experience.title: Student Volunteer

publications: [{"title":"Predicting the next Global Recession : is 2020 the year?","subtitle":"Proceedings of 7th Asia Pacific International Conference","date":"Dec 2019","description":"Abstract of the Research:Purpose of study:A global recession is an extended period of economic decline around the world. The InternationalMonetary Fund (IMF) uses a broad set of criteria to identify global recessions, including a decrease inper-capita gross domestic product (GDP) worldwide. Recently, there has been a prediction of globalrecession approaching. Our study aims at analyzing the changes that have taken place in the recentpast in the economy. Also, we have compared the present situation with 2008 financial crisis.Methodology:This research required data to be collected from various sources. We used this data to analyze howthe key indicators of global recession has changed in the recent past. Some of the indicators usedare: GDP, Gold Prices, Unemployment rate, Confidence index, etc. We have also analyzed theeconomies of countries in near recession or recession stage and compared the current economicconditions with pre 2008 crisis economic scenario. Along with this, we have taken into considerationthe major events that may push the economy towards the recession in 2020 like Brexit deal and US-China trade war.Findings:1. The key recession indicators shows that the economy is moving away from recession.2. Countries in recession like Turkey, have returned to growth.3. Decisions on US-China trade war and Brexit may lead to slow down of economy in 2020.4. There are similarities between the condition today and that of 2008.5. 2020 is likely to be the year of recession.Keywords:Recession, unemployment, GDP, Brexit, Turkey, Travel war, Financial Crisis.Type of research:Analytical Research (Comparative Research), Secondary ResearchISBN- 978-81-928925-5-9"}]
